when did your 3rd sem started , when it's going to end

There is no substitute to hard work. Ask doubts, understand the subject rather than byhearting. There is no easy solution besides taking time to learn and practice. 

If all that didn't work, that's ok! Marks aren't the main thing, education and learning is.
